Package com.oracle.truffle.api.metadata

Deprecated.
The metadata package provides scope APIs related to declared guest language variables.

See: Description

Package com.oracle.truffle.api.metadata Description

The metadata package provides scope APIs related to declared guest language variables. Tools are the main client of these APIs.

Services declared in this package are registered by directly implementing the TruffleLanguage with the appropriate service interface.

This package was deprecated since 0.30 in favor of Scope class, TruffleLanguage.findLocalScopes(C, com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.Node, com.oracle.truffle.api.frame.Frame) and TruffleInstrument.Env.findLocalScopes(com.oracle.truffle.api.nodes.Node, com.oracle.truffle.api.frame.Frame).

Since:
0.26
